us-bibliographic-data-application.invention-title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR MANAGING DISCOUNT VOUCHERS

abstract.p: A first voucher having a voucher purchase price and a discount offer is provided to a first user. The discount is specified as a price reduction or credit applicable towards purchasing a good or service. The first voucher is provided from a platform that is configured to provide a plurality of vouchers, including the first voucher, for a plurality of discounts offered by a plurality of different merchants. After the first user purchases the first voucher at the voucher purchase price in a first transaction, a monetary or fiat currency reward is remitted to one or more users, including the first user. The reward is related to at least a portion of proceeds that were obtained from voucher transactions with respect to a sale of one or more vouchers that occurred prior to the first transaction or wherein such reward is related to proceeds from another source.
